channel.title: NPR Topics: Education
channel.description: We've been to school. We know how education works. Right? In fact, many aspects of learning — in homes, at schools, at work and elsewhere — are evolving rapidly, along with our understanding of learning. Join us as we explore how learning happens.

item.title: Columbia student detained by ICE is abruptly released after Mamdani meets with Trump
item.description: Hours after the student was taken into custody in her campus apartment, she was released, after New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani expressed concerns about the arrest to President Trump.

item.title: Facing a mental health crisis, an NJ school pulled a beloved novel from English class
item.description: Junot Díaz's The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao was removed from an English class at the public school. PEN America says it's part of a trend of scrubbing literature dealing with uncomfortable topics.
